sentences.en: a member of Lancashire County Council
Even in Zurich he kept up with the County cricket scores.
sentences.cn: 即使身在苏黎世，他也一直关注着郡际板球赛的比分。
弗吉尼亚州费尔法克斯县

sentences.en: For a local bus timetable, contact Dyfed County Council.
sentences.cn: 若要当地公共汽车时刻表，请与达费德郡政务委员会联系。

sentences.en: He made 1,972 runs for the county.
He's probably the most hated man in this county.
sentences.cn: 他可能是这个县里最遭人憎恨的人.

sentences.en: I married above myself — rich county people.
sentences.cn: 我高攀了一门亲事，是县里的富有人家。

sentences.en: It was based on Faulkner's own birthplace of Oxford County.
sentences.cn: 这是根据福克纳的出生地牛津郡写的.

sentences.en: Millwall demolished Notts County 6-0 on Saturday.
sentences.cn: 周六米尔沃尔队以6比0大败诺茨郡队。

sentences.en: The canal has proved useful to the county in many ways.
sentences.cn: 这条水渠给这个县带来的好处是多方面的.

sentences.en: The county hospital could find no physical cause for Sumner's problems.
sentences.cn: 关于萨姆纳的问题，县医院查不出任何生理上的原因。

sentences.en: The riots will also mean lost income for Los Angeles County.
sentences.cn: 暴乱还意味着洛杉矶县收入的损失。

sentences.en: These horses were judged the best in the county.
sentences.cn: 这些马被评为全县最好的马.

sentences.en: They hurried through the work and started off for the county town.
sentences.cn: 他们赶忙把工作做完,然后动身到县城去.

sentences.en: We met in Dorchester, Dorset's bustling county town.
sentences.cn: 我们在多塞特熙熙攘攘的郡首府多切斯特相遇。

sentences.en: When the good news reached there, the whole county rejoiced.
sentences.cn: 喜讯传到那里时, 全县的人都欢欣鼓舞起来.

trans.tran_en: an area of a state or country that has its own government to deal with local matters
